text: Now Elisha the prophet summoned a member of the prophetic guild and told him, “Tuck your robes into your belt, take this container of olive oil in your hand, and go to Ramoth Gilead.

When you <st data-num="0935" class="">arrive</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="07200 08033">look for</st> <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="03092" class="">Jehoshaphat</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05250" class="">Nimshi</st> and <st data-num="0935 06965">take</st> him <st data-num="08432 0251">aside</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">into</st> an <st data-num="02315" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="02315" class="">room</st>.<n id="1" />
Take the container of olive oil, pour it over his head, and say, ‘This is what the Lord has said, “I have designated you as king over Israel.”’ Then open the door and run away quickly!”
So the young prophet went to Ramoth Gilead.

When he <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st>, the <st data-num="08269" class="">officers</st> of the <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st> were <st data-num="03427" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="02009" class="">there</st>.<n id="1" /> So he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “I have a <st data-num="01697" class="">message</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">for</st> you, O <st data-num="08269" class="">officer</st>.”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>, “<st data-num="0413" class="">For</st> <st data-num="04310" class="">which</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">one of</st> us?”<n id="3" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0413" class="">For</st> you, O <st data-num="08269" class="">officer</st>.”

So Jehu got up and went inside. Then the prophet poured the olive oil on his head and said to him, “This is what the Lord God of Israel has said, ‘I have designated you as king over the Lord’s people Israel.
You will destroy the family of your master Ahab. I will get revenge against Jezebel for the shed blood of my servants the prophets and for the shed blood of all the Lord’s servants.

<st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab’s</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st> will <st data-num="06" class="">die</st>. I<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="03772" class="">cut off</st> every last <st data-num="08366 07023">male</st> belonging to <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab</st> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, including even the <st data-num="06113" class="">weak</st> and <st data-num="05800" class="">incapacitated</st>.<n id="2" />

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> <st data-num="0256" class="">Ahab’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">dynasty</st><n id="1" /> like <st data-num="01004" class="">those</st> of <st data-num="03379" class="">Jeroboam</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05028" class="">Nebat</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">and</st> <st data-num="01201" class="">Baasha</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0281" class="">Ahijah</st>.
Dogs will devour Jezebel on the plot of ground in Jezreel; she will not be buried.’” Then he opened the door and ran away.

When Jehu rejoined his master’s servants, they asked him, “Is everything all right? Why did this madman visit you?” He replied, “Ah, it’s not important. You know what kind of man he is and the kinds of things he says.”
But they said, “You’re lying! Tell us what he said.” So he told them what he had said. He also related how he had said, “This is what the Lord has said, ‘I have designated you as king over Israel.’”

<st data-num="0376" class="">Each</st> of them <st data-num="04116" class="">quickly</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took off</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">cloak</st>, and they <st data-num="07760" class="">spread</st> them <st data-num="07760" class="">out</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">at</st> Jehu’s<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08478" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01634 04609">steps</st>.<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="07782" class="">trumpet</st> was <st data-num="08628" class="">blown</st><n id="3" /> and they <st data-num="0559" class="">shouted</st>, “<st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> is<n id="4" /> <st data-num="04427" class="">king</st>!”

Then Jehu son of Jehoshaphat son of Nimshi conspired against Joram.

Jehu the Assassin

Now Joram had been in Ramoth Gilead with the whole Israelite army, guarding against an invasion by King Hazael of Syria.

But <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="03088" class="">Joram</st> had <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st> to <st data-num="03157" class="">Jezreel</st> to <st data-num="07495" class="">recover</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="04347 0834">wounds</st> he <st data-num="05221" class="">received</st> from the <st data-num="0761" class="">Syrians</st><n id="1" /> when he <st data-num="03898" class="">fought</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">against</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="02371" class="">Hazael</st> of <st data-num="0758" class="">Syria</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st> his supporters,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> <st data-num="05315" class="">you</st> really <st data-num="03426" class="">want</st> me to be king,<n id="4" /> then <st data-num="0408" class="">don’t</st> let <st data-num="06412" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">escape</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> to <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">warn</st> <st data-num="03157" class="">Jezreel</st>.”
Jehu drove his chariot to Jezreel, for Joram was recuperating there. (Now King Ahaziah of Judah had come down to visit Joram.)

Now the watchman was standing on the tower in Jezreel and saw Jehu’s troops approaching. He said, “I see troops!” Joram ordered, “Send a rider out to meet them and have him ask, ‘Is everything all right?’”

So the <st data-num="07392 05483">horseman</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">meet</st> him and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03541" class="">This is what</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">says</st>, ‘Is <st data-num="07965" class="">everything all right</st>?’”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="04100 07965">None of your business</st>!<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05437 0413 0310">Follow</st> me.” The <st data-num="06822" class="">watchman</st> <st data-num="05046 0559">reported</st>, “The <st data-num="04397" class="">messenger</st> <st data-num="0935 05704">reached</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>, but <st data-num="03808" class="">hasn’t</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">started back</st>.”

So he <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> a <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="07392 05483">horseman</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them<n id="1" /> and he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03541" class="">This is what</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">says</st>, ‘Is <st data-num="07965" class="">everything all right</st>?’”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="04100 07965">None of your business</st>! <st data-num="05437 0413 0310">Follow</st> me.”

The <st data-num="06822" class="">watchman</st> <st data-num="05046 0559">reported</st>, “He <st data-num="0935 05704 0413">reached</st> them, but <st data-num="03808" class="">hasn’t</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">started back</st>. The one who <st data-num="04491" class="">drives</st> the lead chariot <st data-num="04491" class="">drives</st> like <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="05250" class="">Nimshi</st>;<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="05090" class="">drives</st> <st data-num="03588 07697">recklessly</st>.”

Joram ordered, “Hitch up my chariot.” When his chariot had been hitched up, King Joram of Israel and King Ahaziah of Judah went out in their respective chariots to meet Jehu. They met up with him in the plot of land that had once belonged to Naboth of Jezreel.
When Joram saw Jehu, he asked, “Is everything all right, Jehu?” He replied, “How can everything be all right as long as your mother Jezebel promotes idolatry and pagan practices?”

<st data-num="03088" class="">Joram</st> <st data-num="02015" class="">turned</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">chariot</st> <st data-num="02015" class="">around</st> and <st data-num="05127" class="">took off</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0274" class="">Ahaziah</st>, “It’s a <st data-num="04820" class="">trap</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0274" class="">Ahaziah</st>!”

<st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="04390 03027">aimed</st> his <st data-num="07198" class="">bow</st> and <st data-num="05221" class="">shot</st> an arrow right <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> <st data-num="03088" class="">Joram’s</st> <st data-num="02220" class="">shoulders</st>.<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="02678" class="">arrow</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">went through</st><n id="2" /> his <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st> and he <st data-num="03766" class="">fell to</st> his <st data-num="03766" class="">knees</st> in his <st data-num="07393" class="">chariot</st>.

Jehu ordered his officer Bidkar, “Pick him up and throw him into the part of the field that once belonged to Naboth of Jezreel. Remember, you and I were riding together behind his father, Ahab, when the Lord pronounced this oracle against him,

‘“Know for sure that I saw the shed blood of Naboth and his sons yesterday,” says the Lord, “and that I will give you what you deserve right here in this plot of land,” says the Lord.’ So now pick him up and throw him into this plot of land, just as in the Lord’s message.”

When King Ahaziah of Judah saw what happened, he took off up the road to Beth Haggan. Jehu chased him and ordered, “Shoot him too.” They shot him while he was driving his chariot up the ascent of Gur near Ibleam. He fled to Megiddo and died there.

His <st data-num="05650" class="">servants</st> <st data-num="07392" class="">took</st> his body<n id="1" /> back to <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="06912" class="">buried</st> him in his <st data-num="06900" class="">tomb</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">City</st> of <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st>.
Ahaziah had become king over Judah in the eleventh year of Joram son of Ahab.
Jehu approached Jezreel. When Jezebel heard the news, she put on some eye liner, fixed up her hair, and leaned out the window.

When <st data-num="03058" class="">Jehu</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> through the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>, she <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Is <st data-num="07965" class="">everything all right</st>, <st data-num="02174" class="">Zimri</st>, <st data-num="02026" class="">murderer</st> of his <st data-num="0113" class="">master</st>?”<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="05375 06440">looked up</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="02474" class="">window</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> is <st data-num="0854" class="">on</st> my <st data-num="0854" class="">side</st>? <st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st>?” <st data-num="08147" class="">Two</st> or <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05631" class="">eunuchs</st> <st data-num="08259" class="">looked down</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> him.

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="08058" class="">Throw</st> her <st data-num="08058" class="">down</st>!” So they <st data-num="08058" class="">threw</st> her <st data-num="08058" class="">down</st>, and when she hit the ground,<n id="1" /> her <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="05137" class="">splattered</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="07023" class="">wall</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st>, and Jehu <st data-num="07429" class="">drove</st> his chariot <st data-num="07429" class="">over</st> her.<n id="2" />

He <st data-num="0935" class="">went inside</st> and <st data-num="0398 08354">had a meal</st>.<n id="1" /> Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="06485 04994">Dispose</st> of <st data-num="02063" class="">this</st> <st data-num="0779">accursed woman’s</st> corpse. <st data-num="06912" class="">Bury</st> her, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> after all, <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> was a <st data-num="04428" class="">king’s</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st>.”<n id="2" />

But when they <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st> to <st data-num="06912" class="">bury</st> her, they <st data-num="04672" class="">found</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nothing</st> left <st data-num="03588 0518">but</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01538" class="">skull</st>, <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st>, and <st data-num="03709" class="">palms</st> of the <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st>.

So they went back and told him. Then he said, “It is the fulfillment of the Lord’s message that he had spoken through his servant, Elijah the Tishbite, ‘In the plot of land at Jezreel, dogs will devour Jezebel’s flesh.
Jezebel’s corpse will be like manure on the surface of the ground in the plot of land at Jezreel. People will not be able to even recognize her.’”
